alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Hardee, eastern Manatee, central Charlotte, southwestern Polk, southeastern Hillsborough, western DeSoto and east central Sarasota Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 541 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cluster of thunderstorms with a nearly stationary movement. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bartow, Arcadia, Wauchula, Fish Hawk, Brandon, Ona, Babcock Webb Wma, Southeast Arcadia, Medulla, Babcock Ranch, Charlotte County Airport, Mulberry, Bowling Green, Alafia River State Park, Nocatee, Limestone, Brownville, Harbour Heights, Cleveland and Fort Lonesome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk
